name: Free Fall (Noah DeCambra)
description:
Enjoy free falling in this endless runner! Select different trails and a color to customize your character.  Please leave a review and advice on what improvements you would like to see to the game :)

This is the alpha version of this game so expect much more content to come over the following months:

  • More trails
  • Hat options
  • Different song options
  • Shop for trails, hats, and colors
  • In-Game currency (game will be free, only way to earn currency is by playing)
  • More platforms (clouds)
  • And more!!!
